牎字的基本解释

牎
chuāng
古同“窗”。

牎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chuāng］
［《集韻》初江切，平江，初。］
亦作“牎1”。亦作“牕1”。“葱2”的被通假字。“囱1”的今字。亦作“窓1”。亦作“窻1”。亦作“1”。亦作“1”。
(1)设在屋顶或壁上用以透光通风的洞口。今一般装有窗扇。
(2)茶炉通风漏灰的洞。
[②]［cōng］
［《集韻》麤叢切，平東，清。］
亦作“牎2”。亦作“牕2”。
烟突；灶上烟囱。

牎字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【片字部】　牎； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页693第42
【唐韻】楚江切【集韻】【韻會】初江切，?音摐。◎按說文本作囪。在牆曰牖。在屋曰囪。或作窗。玉篇始書作牎，亦作䆫。廣韻俗作窓。互詳穴部䆫字註。至正韻又書作牕，云：俗作牎。字彙仍之。蓋以說文从囪不从匆也，不知篆从囪，隸从匆。故玉篇，廣韻，集韻有牎無牕。正韻以牎爲俗字，非也。　又【集韻】麤叢切，音怱。本作䆫。義同。

牎字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chuāng］
["Ji Yun" Chu Jiang Qi, Ping Jiang, Chu. ]
Also known as "牎1". Also known as "牕1". The false word for "onion 2". The present word for "Chamn 1". Also known as "窓1". Also known as "窻1". Also called "1". Also called "1".
(1) An opening on the roof or wall for light transmission and ventilation. Window sashes are generally installed today.
(2) A hole for ventilating and leaking ash from the tea stove.
[②]［cōng］
["Ji Yun" rough cut, Pingdong, Qing. ]
Also known as "牎2". Also known as "牕2".
Smoke bursts; the stove tops the chimney.
牎

[Si Collection] [Film Word Department] 　牎; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 693-42
[Tang Yun] Chu Jiangqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Chu Jiangqie,? ◎The text is supposed to be a chimney. On the wall said 牖. In the house called the chimney. Or as a window. The first book of the jade chapter is made as a 牎, and it is also made a ling. Guangyun is a common practice. Mutually detailed acupuncture points. To Zhengyun, the book is made of 牕, saying: vulgar made 牎. The vocabulary remains the same. Guyi said that Wen Cong Cong did not follow Huxie, and he did not know that Zhuan Cong Cong, but he did not follow Huxie. Therefore, the jade chapter, Guangyun, Jiyun has no 牕牕. Zhengyun uses 牎 as a vulgar character, not too.　[Jiyun] Thick clump cut, rushed sound. This is for you. The same meaning.
